instruction: Extract meaningful features from time-series data for machine learning applications. Implement various feature extraction techniques including statistical features, frequency domain features, time domain features, and advanced methods like tsfresh automated feature extraction.
description: Extract comprehensive features from time-series data for machine learning. Implement statistical, frequency, and time domain feature extraction methods.
keywords: feature extraction, time-series, statistical features, frequency domain, tsfresh, python, pandas, numpy, machine learning features
